name: Lil Man IT Consulting
tag_list: it-consulting, it-support, remote-tech-support, cloud-applications, small-business-computer-support, cloud-apps
overview:
Lil Man IT Consulting provides consulting & tech support to small office & individually run businesess while connecting them to the next generation of cloud computing technology and web applications to help their business run smarter.

Lil Man IT Consulting, LLC is an online consulting company with the goal of connecting small online businesses to web applications that will help them start, run, and grow their business. In addition to that Lil Man IT also provides remote tech support and consulting for your small business. Whether your business is online or offline, having a dedicated IT support resource can be a great benefit. Who doesnâ€™t need computer support these days. And with the internet changing and growing, I figured you could also use a guide to help you navigate all that it has to offer.

Unlike traditional IT Consutling firms. Lil Man IT Consulting focuses on providing solutions that are geared towards running your â€œlil man businessâ€™. With the ever increasing role the internet is starting to play in business, aspiring entrepreneurs are at a unique opportunity to start taking advantage of all the resources and cloud based solutions that will help them run a lean, smart, and scalable company.
